= Centralized Server Design =

== Connection Overview ==

  # Application Start
  # *Selection*: Singleplayer or Multiplayer
    * *Selected* Multiplayer
  # *Selection*: New User or Username/password
    * *Selected* New User
  # *Data Entry* Username and password
    * If username is taken, user is prompted to re-enter information.
  # *Selection*: New User or Username/password
    * *Selected* Username and Password
  # *Selection* Lobby Screen
    * Lobby screen should, minimally, have a list of "tables" that players can sit down at to play
    * Lobby should also have a chat function to chat with other players in the lobby.
    * Only tables with open seats are seen here.  Other tables are hidden.
  # *Selected* Player selects a table.
    * Information about the table appears, including who is playing, any rules, etc.
    * *Option* Join table
  # *Selected* Join Table -> Table Screen
    * Table chat
    * *Option* Ready to Play
    * List of players
  # When all players have selected ready to play, start the game.
